name: AI Story
description:
A video game short story, about an A.I. that begins to show signs of growing ruthless in favor of completing it's stated goal.

It was originally created as part of micro-game-jam where I created the game in a week in order to be able to publish a game, which I called Credible Project (abbreviated to CP). With that in mind, it's not particularly unique, the story hinges on something that couldn't happen, and the writing could probably be improved, but it is some kind of a game that I can publish.
Total development time comes to about 10.5 hours.

The game unfortunately only supports Windows.

This game is provided for free. Donations are not required, but are appreciated.
